reviewText: Thought it was very informative would definitely order more of his videos and would reccommend too anyone interested I. The big five
excellent hunting vid! methodical and well thought out, none of that concocted drama you find in some other african videos.

Hello,

My son and myself laid back and watched this DVD and very much enjoyed it.  I like Mr. Boddington's Videos because he will try anything.  His equipment has to function but it does not have so many criteria that no normal hunter can afford to purchase them.  If you have ever hunted Buffalo, are planning to, or just want to dream of hunting Buffalo, then you will be very much entertained.

Thanks

There is a lot of good information, and great video.  The only reason this is not a five star review is the 6 minutes of advertisements preceding the actual video, and all the product placement type ads in the video itself, which I found to detract from the otherwise high quality video.
